alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas, northeastern Logan, southwestern Sheridan and northwestern Gove Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Oakley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oakley around 510 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 67 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
